info.title: USAJOBS
info.description: USAJOBS.gov is the Federal Government's official job board, providing free access to thousands of job opportunities across hundreds of federal agencies and organizations. As the primary source for federal job listings, applications, and employment opportunity information, USAJOBS.gov offers a diverse range of positions to job seekers. With over 17 million users, it helps connect candidates with federal careers, ensuring fair and equal opportunity in the hiring process.

get.description: Search USAJOBS for job opportunity announcements.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: Search based on a keyword.

parameters.name: PositionTitle
parameters.description: Search for job announcements containing this title.

parameters.name: RemunerationMinimumAmount
parameters.description: Minimum salary for the job.

parameters.name: RemunerationMaximumAmount
parameters.description: Maximum salary for the job.

parameters.name: PayGradeHigh
parameters.description: Maximum pay grade for the job.

parameters.name: PayGradeLow
parameters.description: Minimum pay grade for the job.

parameters.name: JobCategoryCode
parameters.description: Job category series code.

parameters.name: RemoteIndicator
parameters.description: Indicates if the job is remote.

parameters.name: LocationName
parameters.description: Location name for the job.

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius for location-based search.

parameters.name: RelocationIndicator
parameters.description: Indicates if the job offers relocation.

parameters.name: TravelPercentage
parameters.description: Travel percentage for the job.

parameters.name: Organization
parameters.description: Agency subelement code.

parameters.name: PositionOfferingTypeCode
parameters.description: Position offering type code.

parameters.name: PositionScheduleTypeCode
parameters.description: Position schedule type code.

parameters.name: SecurityClearanceRequired
parameters.description: Security clearance required for the job.

parameters.name: PositionSensitivity
parameters.description: Position sensitivity and risk level.

parameters.name: SupervisoryStatus
parameters.description: Supervisory status of the job.

parameters.name: DatePosted
parameters.description: Number of days since the job was posted.

parameters.name: JobGradeCode
parameters.description: Grade code for the job.

parameters.name: WhoMayApply
parameters.description: Candidate designation for the job.

parameters.name: SalaryBucket
parameters.description: Salary range grouping.

parameters.name: GradeBucket
parameters.description: Grade level grouping.

parameters.name: HiringPath
parameters.description: Hiring paths for the job.

parameters.name: MissionCriticalTags
parameters.description: Mission-critical tags for the job.

parameters.name: PostingChannel
parameters.description: Posting channel for the job.

parameters.name: Fields
parameters.description: Level of detail in the job data.

parameters.name: SortField
parameters.description: Field to sort the results by.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.description: Direction to sort the results.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page number for the results.

parameters.name: ResultsPerPage
parameters.description: Number of results per page, up to 500.

SearchParameters.title: Search Parameters
SearchParameters.description: The parameters used in the search request.

SearchResultCount.title: Search Result Count
SearchResultCount.description: Number of records returned in the response.

SearchResultCountAll.title: Search Result Count All
SearchResultCountAll.description: Total number of records that matched the search criteria.

SearchResultItems.title: Search Result Items
SearchResultItems.description: Array of job opportunity announcement objects that matched the search criteria.

MatchedObjectDescriptor.title: Matched Object Descriptor
MatchedObjectDescriptor.description: Detailed description of the matched object.

PositionURI.title: Position URI
PositionURI.description: URI to view the job offering.

ApplyURI.title: Apply URI
ApplyURI.description: URI to apply for the job offering.

OrganizationName.title: Organization Name
OrganizationName.description: Name of the organization or agency offering the position.

DepartmentName.title: Department Name
DepartmentName.description: Name of the department within the organization or agency offering the position.

PositionOfferingType.title: Position Offering Type
PositionOfferingType.description: List of position offering type objects.

Name.title: Position Offering Type Name
Name.description: Name of the position offering type.

Code.title: Position Offering Type Code
Code.description: Code of the position offering type.

QualificationSummary.title: Qualification Summary
QualificationSummary.description: Summary of qualifications for the job offering.

RateIntervalCode.title: Rate Interval Code
RateIntervalCode.description: Rate interval code for the salary.

PositionStartDate.title: Position Start Date
PositionStartDate.description: The date the job opportunity will be open to applications.

PositionEndDate.title: Position End Date
PositionEndDate.description: Last date the job opportunity will be posted.

PublicationStartDate.title: Publication Start Date
PublicationStartDate.description: Date the job opportunity is posted.

ApplicationCloseDate.title: Application Close Date
ApplicationCloseDate.description: Last date applications will be accepted for the job opportunity.

PositionFormattedDescription.title: Position Formatted Description
PositionFormattedDescription.description: List of objects providing a quick summary of the job opportunity.

MajorDuties.title: Major Duties
MajorDuties.description: Description of the duties of the job.

Education.title: Education
Education.description: Education required or preferred by applicants.

Requirements.title: Requirements
Requirements.description: Key requirements of the job opportunity.

Evaluations.title: Evaluations
Evaluations.description: Qualification requirements of the job opportunity.

HowToApply.title: How To Apply
HowToApply.description: Description of the steps to take to apply for the job opportunity.

WhatToExpectNext.title: What To Expect Next
WhatToExpectNext.description: Description of what can be expected during the application process.

RequiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
RequiredDocuments.description: Required documents when applying for the job opportunity.

Benefits.title: Benefits
Benefits.description: Benefits being offered as part of the job opportunity.

BenefitsUrl.title: Benefits Url
BenefitsUrl.description: URL to view benefit details being offered.

OtherInformation.title: Other Information
OtherInformation.description: Additional information about the job opportunity.

KeyRequirements.title: Key Requirements
KeyRequirements.description: List of requirements for the job opportunity.

WhoMayApply.title: Who May Apply
WhoMayApply.description: Object containing values for name and code of who may apply to the job opportunity.

LowGrade.title: Low Grade
LowGrade.description: Lowest potential grade level for the job opportunity.

HighGrade.title: High Grade
HighGrade.description: Highest potential grade level for the job opportunity.

OrganizationCodes.title: Organization Codes
OrganizationCodes.description: Organization codes separated by a slash (/).

IsRadialSearch.title: Is Radial Search
IsRadialSearch.description: Indicates if a radial search was performed.

RelevanceRank.title: Relevance Rank
RelevanceRank.description: Relevance rank of the search result.

NumberOfPages.title: Number Of Pages
NumberOfPages.description: Number of pages based on SearchResultCount divided by SearchResultCountAll.

IsRadialSearch.title: Is Radial Search
IsRadialSearch.description: Indicates if a radial search was performed.

SearchCodelistResponse.title: Search Codelist Response
SearchCodelistResponse.description: Response containing a list of codes and their details for dynamic values.

results.title: Search Code List Results
results.description: A list of codes and their associated values.

items.title: Search Code List Item
items.description: An item in the code list containing valid values.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The description of the code value.
